moves.12... Qf6: glad he did not convert, stil fighting, getting my queen out and attacking 2 pieces

moves.14. Qd1 Qe5: thanks but no thanks, could not trade out because he had the advantage
moves.15. Qg4+ Kd8: here he comes all over again
moves.16. Bg5+ Ne7: had to get pieces into action
moves.20. Nf3 a5: thinking of getting the rook out somehow, should have played c7 here....
moves.23. Ng5 Qe7: just hanging in there waiting for my move
moves.26. Qh6 d5: He could trade queens on h7 and win another pawn
moves.27. exd5: this is what i hoped for, going for the backrank mate
moves.29. dxc6 Qe3+: trying to push the king back
